content: penis chapstick cozy crochet pattern a larger pictured right finished length 3 5 inches 9 cm this pattern has larger testes than pattern b with e/3 5mm or f/3 75mm hook and worsted weight 4/ medium yarn in color of your choice round 1 make magic loop then single_crochet 6 in magic loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase 8 sts turn work right side out round 3 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet increase 10 sts round 4 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet increase 12 sts round 5 in front loops only single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet increase 14 sts round 6 turn round 5 down to show remaining back loops of round 4 in back loops only of round 4 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in each single_crochet around 11 sts round 7-15 9 rounds in both loops single_crochet in each single_crochet around 11 sts add or subtract rounds to fit your lip balm length round 16 6 tc popcorn see below in next single_crochet slip_stitch in next 2 single_crochet 6 tc popcorn slip_stitch in next 2 single_crochet invisible fasten_off do not finish round key ring option attach jump ring in round 16 on side opposite of popcorn stitches attach keychain ring to jump ring instructions for 6 tc popcorn 1 work six triple crochets into the same stitch it should look like a fan or shell 2 pull up the working loop on your hook so it s large and you don t have to worry about losing it then remove your hook from the loop 3 count back six triple crochet stitches and insert your hook into the first triple crochet you made 4 go through the loose working loop with your hook still in the first triple crochet once the loop is around your hook you can tighten it again 5 draw the working loop through the loops of the first triple crochet to close up and complete the popcorn a finished popcorn should look like a cup made of triple crochets jana whitley ravelry com april 2025 penis chapstick cozy crochet pattern b smaller pictured bottom finished length 3 5 inches 9 cm with e/3 5mm or f/3 75mm hook and worsted weight 4/ medium yarn in color of your choice round 1 make magic loop then single_crochet 6 in magic loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase 8 sts turn work right side out round 3 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet increase 10 sts round 4-5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 sts round 6 back post single_crochet in each single_crochet around or single_crochet around if you want a smooth tip without a ridge 10 sts round 7-16 10 rounds single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 sts round 17 6 double_crochet
